game.name: Hoop Dungeon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hoop Dungeon is a basketball turn-based tactical roguelike game. Use the powers of friendship and rivalry to become a better basketball player and conquer the Hoop Dungeon.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hoop Dungeon is a basketball turn-based tactical roguelike game. Use the powers of friendship and rivalry to become a better basketball player and conquer the Hoop Dungeon.
